title: Welcome on the Nowicki lab webpage!
summary: Intro to the Nowicki lab, [Dept. of Entomology and Plant Pathology at University of Tennessee](https://epp.tennessee.edu).

title: Road trips for redbuds; An assessment of the genetic diversity and spatial distribution of Cercis canadensis in the US
summary: Genetic diversity study of Eastern redbud indicates two distinct genetic clusters across the species native range in the US.

title: The effect of habitat fragmentation on genetic diversity and differentiation; fine-scale population structure of Cercis canadensis (Eastern Redbud)
summary: Fine-scale genetic diversity study of Eastern redbud indicates two distinct genetic clusters in the Southern Appalachia.

title: Evaluation of genetic diversity of Asian callery pear
summary: In this endeavor, Shiwani (MS student) is evaluating species diversity using *de novo* gSSRs. We accrued samples of non-cultivated *P. calleryana* from Asia. Molecular markers will be tested for cross-amplification to related species as well.
